html:
Welcome to Day 8. We have 4 days before Christmas. It’s almost the cutoff to getting packages delivered before Christmas. I hope you have completed the bulk of your shopping already. The eighth day is eight maids a-milking.

The term “a-milking” had different connotations beyond simply milking the odd cow here and there in the 15th and 16th centuries, but I’m not sure that was what they meant. Let’s just leave this as the subject of 8, and maids.

Canon EOS R8

The ultimate (and only really) Canon RF full-frame compact travel full-frame camera. It packs great features and capabilities in a small form factor.

Canon EOS R8

  • 24.2MP Full-Frame CMOS Sensor
  • 4K60p 10-Bit Internal Video, Canon Log 3
  • 2.36m-Dot OLED Electronic Viewfinder
  • 3.0″ 1.62m-Dot Vari-Angle Touchscreen
  • Dual Pixel CMOS AF II
  • 40 fps Electronic Shutter
  • Movie Digital IS
  • Vertical Movie Mode
  • Microphone Input, Headphone Output
  • Multi-Function Shoe, Wi-Fi & Bluetooth

We also have a great kit with the R8, which I highly recommend. I mean, who doesn’t need extra stuff for the same price?

Canon EOS R8 Bundle Kit

  • 24.2MP Full-Frame CMOS Sensor
  • 4K60p 10-Bit Internal Video, Canon Log 3
  • 2.36m-Dot OLED Electronic Viewfinder
  • 3.0″ 1.62m-Dot Vari-Angle Touchscreen
  • Dual Pixel CMOS AF II
  • Shoe Cover
  • Canon 1 Year Limited Warranty
  • 64GB SDXC Memory Card
  • Slinger Shoulder Bag
  • ProOptic Complete Optics Care and Cleaning Kit

Now, to take pictures of maids, you need lenses, my friend, and there’s no better lens for portraiture on a budget than the Canon RF 85mm series of lenses. Canon has two lenses depending on your budget: the Canon RF 85mm f/1.2L USM and the Canon RF 85mm f/2.0 Macro IS STM

Canon RF 85mm f/1.2L USM

  • RF-Mount Lens/Full-Frame Format
  • Aperture Range: f/1.2 to f/16
  • Blue Spectrum Refractive Optics Element
  • One UD Element, One Aspherical Element
  • Air Sphere Coating
  • Ring-Type Ultrasonic Motor AF System
  • Customizable Control Ring
  • Rounded 9-Blade Diaphragm

Canon RF 85mm f/2.0 Macro IS STM

  • RF-Mount Lens/Full-Frame Format
  • Maximum Magnification: 1:2
  • Minimum Focusing Distance: 1.15′
  • One UD Element
  • STM Stepping AF Motor
  • Optical Image Stabilization; Hybrid IS
  • Customizable Control Ring
  • Rounded 9-Blade Diaphragm

When you purchase through links on our site, we may earn an affiliate commission. Here's how it works.
